data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word فَكَانَتْ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to rise so as to float in the air (dust), be turned into ashes (embers).
data.sentence: The word هَبَاءً comes from the root ه ب و and is associated with the meanings: to rise so as to float in the air (dust), be turned into ashes (embers).
The word مُنْبَثًّا comes from the root ب ث ث and is associated with the meanings: spread/dispersed/scattered, published/revealed.
